name: github-insights-dashboard
description: React app: dashboard for checking commit history with TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, Jest, Husky, and TailwindCSS

scripts.start: echo '🚀 Starting the app...' && webpack serve --config webpack.config.mjs && echo '🌟✨ App is up and running! Visit http://localhost:3000 ✨'
scripts.build: echo '🔨 Building the app...' && webpack --config webpack.config.mjs && echo '🏗️✨ Build completed! Your app is ready! ✨'
scripts.format: echo '🖋️ Formatting code... Please wait.' && prettier --write . && echo '✅ Your code is formatted!'
scripts.lint: echo '🧹 Linting code... Please wait.' && eslint -c eslint.config.js . && echo '✅ Linting complete. Your code is clean!'
scripts.lint-fix: echo '🔧 Linting and fixing issues...' && eslint --fix . && prettier --write .
scripts.precommit: echo '🔒 Precommit: Linting and testing code...' && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.pretest: echo '🔎 Pretest: Linting code...' && npm run lint
scripts.debug: echo '🐞 Starting the app in debug mode...' && NODE_ENV=development nodemon --inspect src/index.tsx
scripts.clean: echo '🧽 Cleaning up...' && rm -rf ./node_modules ./dist && rm package-lock.json
scripts.docker-clean: echo '🧹 Cleaning up Docker resources...' && docker stop $(docker ps -aq) && docker rm $(docker ps -aq) && docker image prune -af && docker volume prune -f && docker network prune -f && docker builder prune -f
scripts.generate-tests: echo '🛠️ Generating missing test files... 📂' && node scripts/generate-tests.js && echo '✅ Test generation complete! 🎉'

author: Jagoda11
